summary: FedralAI - Reinforcing AI with Blockchain. Experience the unparalleled benefits of blockchain in AI - Data Integrity, Immutability, Secure Aggregation, and Transparent Traceability.The collaborative and decentralized nature of Federated Learning aims to address these issues by enabling users to contribute to the training process without the need for prohibitively expensive hardware, while simultaneously fostering a more privacy-preserving and secure AI model training environment.
